title: What happened to the swim program for special needs students of New Hanover County Schools?  For several years the students got to go swimming once a week at the YMCA for at least part of the school year.  Most of the students looked forward to going to YMCA because it was fun, a very good exercise to help with gross motor skills, good sensory activity and gave them something to look forward to for the special olympics.
